programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry) S1 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt»Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pièce de théâtre) S1 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La pièce de théâtre»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le vent d'automne) S2 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are watching their favourite television programme: "Detective Potato". Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. So, Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George try to find him. Using a magnifying glass, Peppa and George follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le super outil d'espions) S6 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Le super outil d'espions»When supervillain Dr. Coldfinger takes Curly Q's newest invention, the Ultra Spy Tool, Secret Agents Molly, Goby and Spy Pup must travel across the world to find and infiltrate his North Pole lair with regular tools to save the day!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le nouveau voisin de Blue) S3 (1/18)
programme.desc: «Le nouveau voisin de Blue»Josh and Blue have some big news - a new neighbour just moved in next door and it's...Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how to help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (4/18)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'histoire des deux Tomás) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «L'histoire des deux Tomás»It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (A la recherche du trésor d'Abuelo) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «A la recherche du trésor d'Abuelo»Abuelo's Treasure: The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day! (S2, ep 6b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Baby, super requin»Vigo's evil plot to turn everyfishy in Carnivore Cove into babies backfires when toddlers Super Shark and Captain Kelp turn out to be a finful.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les instruments de musique) S1 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Les instruments de musique»Papa et maman Cochon découvrent des instruments de musique dans le grenier. Maman joue du violon, papa se met à l'accordéon et Peppa fait du tambour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grenouilles, vers et papillons) S1 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Grenouilles, vers et papillons»Peppa et George jouent dans le jardin de leur papy. Peppa fait semblant d'être un papillon. Papy montre à George comment faire le ver...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les déguisements) S1 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les déguisements»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»The Blue Butterfly: Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. (S1, ep 73).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Atchoum !) S1 (74/78)
programme.desc: «Atchoum !»Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Du nouveau à l'école de Blue) S3 (17/18)
programme.desc: «Du nouveau à l'école de Blue»Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bébé dauphin) S2 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Le bébé dauphin»Adventure Bay's newest Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it's up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay and with her parents.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal»Candy floss clouds cause confusion in 'Every Cloud', and then in 'Rainbow Comet Rush', can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? (S2, ep 11).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?) S2 (n°207)
programme.desc: «La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?»It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure) S1 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau»Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza in 'Snowball Bonanza', and in 'The Present', Baby Shark goes undercover to get the perfect gift for Mummy Shark. (S1, ep 15).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Shooting Star) S1 (13/78)
programme.desc: «Shooting Star»Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favourite circus show does not work. So the others create their own circus acts in the backyard instead. (S1, ep 14).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (15/78)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (16/78)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les nouvelles chaussures) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles chaussures»Maman achète à Peppa des chaussures qu'elle ne veut plus quitter. Mais pour jouer dans la boue, elle consent finalement à enfiler une vieille paire de souliers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»Peppa et George se demandent quoi offrir à leur maman à l'occasion de son anniversaire. Ils interrogent papa Cochon à ce sujet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La lessive) S3 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La lessive»Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too - which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en bateau de Polly) S3 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en bateau de Polly»Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Delphine l'âne) S3 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Delphine l'âne»Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Tenderest Bond of All) S1 (18/52)
programme.desc: «The Tenderest Bond of All»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Robot Power) S4 (3/20)
programme.desc: «Robot Power»When Crusher unleashes three of his most destructive creations on Axle City, there's only one hero strong enough to save the day: Robot Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course folle des skis à réaction) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «La course folle des skis à réaction»Crusher thinks he can beat Blaze with his rocket skis, but the rocket skis run wild and send Crusher in the wrong direction. Crusher's grandmother helps Blaze and AJ to bring Crusher to a stop.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La bouche du tonnerre / Madame Goodmoustache) S7 (26/26)
programme.desc: «La bouche du tonnerre / Madame Goodmoustache»Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc) S2 (8/20)
programme.desc: «La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc»Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Night of the Disco Lights) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Night of the Disco Lights»Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry) S1 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt»Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pièce de théâtre) S1 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La pièce de théâtre»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le vent d'automne) S2 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are watching their favourite television programme: "Detective Potato". Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. So, Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George try to find him. Using a magnifying glass, Peppa and George follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le super outil d'espions) S6 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Le super outil d'espions»When supervillain Dr. Coldfinger takes Curly Q's newest invention, the Ultra Spy Tool, Secret Agents Molly, Goby and Spy Pup must travel across the world to find and infiltrate his North Pole lair with regular tools to save the day!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le nouveau voisin de Blue) S3 (1/18)
programme.desc: «Le nouveau voisin de Blue»Josh and Blue have some big news - a new neighbour just moved in next door and it's...Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how to help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (4/18)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'histoire des deux Tomás) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «L'histoire des deux Tomás»It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (A la recherche du trésor d'Abuelo) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «A la recherche du trésor d'Abuelo»Abuelo's Treasure: The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day! (S2, ep 6b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Baby, super requin»Vigo's evil plot to turn everyfishy in Carnivore Cove into babies backfires when toddlers Super Shark and Captain Kelp turn out to be a finful.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La garderie à domicile) S1 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La garderie à domicile»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Funny Photo) S1 (n°77)
programme.desc: «The Funny Photo»While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The Gift Box: The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. But he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift. (S1, ep 78).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (No Time Like the Present Store) S3 (n°3)
programme.desc: «No Time Like the Present Store»At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fresque de la mini patrouille / La pomme de terre arc-en-ciel) S7 (16/26)
programme.desc: «La fresque de la mini patrouille / La pomme de terre arc-en-ciel»The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity) S2 (9/20)
programme.desc: «Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity»Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade in 'Lady Monkey Mech', then in 'Critter Care Calamity', Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «S'mores»S'Mores: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends. (S1, ep 4b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Les billets perdus) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les billets perdus»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le gobelin farceur / Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le gobelin farceur / Baby, super requin»Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (3/78)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christophe) S1 (4/78)
programme.desc: «Super Christophe»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (17/78)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»A Very Busy Afternoon: Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, (S1, ep 17).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (18/78)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»The Four-Leaf Clover: Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her! Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win. (S1, ep 18).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (19/78)
programme.desc: «The Collection»The Collection: Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. (S1, ep 19).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (20/78)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La cabane dans l'arbre) S1 (37/52)
programme.desc: «La cabane dans l'arbre»Peppa and George visit Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig. Grandpa Pig built them a tree house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de pompier) S3 (13/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de pompier»When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Princesse Peppa) S3 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Princesse Peppa»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Teddy Maternello) S3 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Teddy Maternello»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery...) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery...»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (The Chicken Circus!) S4 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Chicken Circus!»Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La Course vers le Rocher de l'Aigle) S2 (18/20)
programme.desc: «La Course vers le Rocher de l'Aigle»Blaze and AJ visit VelocityVille, a town full of race cars where everybody loves to go fast! When a snooty car named Speedrick traps all the other racers, Blaze must transform into a super-fast race car to free his new friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les rollers de Danny / La surprise de Ryder) S7 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Les rollers de Danny / La surprise de Ryder»A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Deux maires en détresse / Le jeu des cow-boys) S7 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Deux maires en détresse / Le jeu des cow-boys»While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. // The Wingnuts' farm plays host to a rootin' tootin Game Show hosted by Cowgirl Beryl!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune) S2 (10/20)
programme.desc: «Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune»Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!
